info.name: Mustakbaly API - Learning & Reporting
info.description:
**Learning Module** and **Reporting Module** API collection.

- **Auth**: Run Login (under Auth) to get a JWT; it is saved to the `token` environment variable automatically.
- **base_url**: Use environment "Mustakbaly Local" with base_url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1. All request URLs use {{base_url}} so no duplicate /api/v1.
- **Create requests** (Course Type, Course, Lesson, Unit, Enrollment): the new resource ID is saved to the environment automatically (courseType, course, lesson, unit, enrollment).
- **Grouped by role**: Super Admin, Manager, Instructor, Student, Donor.
